Material used.Description: Assays were performed using recombinant a-synuclein proteins with A30P, A53T, and E46K mutations

Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutation showed normal phospholipid binding
A53T mutation exhibited decreased phospholipid binding
E46K mutation showed enhanced phospholipid binding

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in three biological replicates

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was tested in triplicate

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type a-synuclein was used as a positive control

Basic negative control.Description: A-synuclein knockout cells were used as a negative control

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare binding affinities

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding affinity greater than 50% of wild-type

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding affinity less than 30% of wild-type

Material used.Description: Filament formation was assessed using recombinant a-synuclein proteins with A30P, A53T, and E46K mutations

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant change in assembly rate
Readout description.Result Description: A30P mutation showed normal filament assembly rate
A53T mutation exhibited decreased filament assembly rate
E46K mutation showed enhanced filament assembly rate

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in three biological replicates

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was tested in triplicate

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type a-synuclein was used as a positive control

Basic negative control.Description: A-synuclein knockout cells were used as a negative control

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare assembly rates

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Assembly rate greater than 80% of wild-type

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Assembly rate less than 50% of wild-type
